texts.name: Mahyar
texts.biography: Mahyar was a poor woodcutter until he discovered the secret of a thieves' den. He sought a new life among them and later became the leader of the sharpshooters.

specialty.name: Sharpshooter
specialty.description:
{Sharpshooter}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Sharpshooter or Veteran Sharpshooter for each level attained after 5th level.
